content: व्युत्थानं, व्युत्थितिः {%<ab>f.</ab>%} {@--1@} Great activity. {@--2@} Rising up against, opposition, obstruction. {@--3@} Independent action, following one's own bent of mind. {@--4@} The completion of religious abstraction or abstract meditation (in Yoga <ab>phil.</ab>). {@--5@} A kind of dance. {@--6@} Causing (an elephant) to rise; <ls>Śi. 18. 26.</ls> {@--7@} Contradicting.
